channel.title: Need help berserker ring doesnt give me any stat bonuses
channel.description: my item.cfg it3m = 6737 Berserker_Ring A_ring_reputed_to_bring_out_a_berserk_fury_in_its_wearer. 6000 6000 8000 0 0 4 0 0 0 0 4 0 0 4 0 i logged got a berserker ring it gave me no stat bonuses then i changed the 3 in it3m to an e so it was item and i got this error Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:29) so basicly i am stuck can anyone help?

item.title: Need help berserker ring doesnt give me any stat bonuses

item.description:
@propabad wrote:

my item.cfg
it3m = 6737 Berserker_Ring A_ring_reputed_to_bring_out_a_berserk_fury_in_its_wearer. 6000 6000 8000 0 0 4 0 0 0 0 4 0 0 4 0
i logged got a berserker ring it gave me no stat bonuses
then i changed the 3 in it3m to an e so it was item and i got this error
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6
at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312)
at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:39)
at server.main(server.java:29)
so basicly i am stuck can anyone help?
